website_summaries.verdict: This top-selling moisturizer has become a fan-favorite by tarte enthusiasts for moisturizing without being heavy, regardless of skin types. Delivers impressive results for most users.
pros: A unique formula that's made with sea salts, antioxidants, and hyaluronic acid that improves the look of skin while it moisturizes
Suitable for all skin types, and doesn't tend to irritate sensitive skin
cons: Texture is slightly sticky, but this wasn't a deal breaker for most users

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating Boost
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a birthday gift. My granddaughter loved it. It met expectations and was delivered in a timely manner. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Carol K.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely lovely!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It’s lightweight and non-greasy. Skin feels great when using this moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Mayleen

customer_reviews.title: Feels amazing
customer_reviews.text: Sea Drink H2O feels amazing when applied to your face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I can't live my life without this product!!! It is amazing!! Makes my skin so soft and hydrated!
customer_reviews.author: Bethanie Moore

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this. I started using this a week ago ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this. I started using this a week ago and my skin is so comfortable now, not dry anymore and not oily. Will continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy or oily and really moisturizes
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite moisturizer. Not heavy or oily and does the trick
customer_reviews.author: AlexandraJulia

customer_reviews.title: Best smoothing hydrating addition to skincare
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is awesome!! I particularly love it around my frown lines and eyes it’s smooth and plumping and so hydrating!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Ladd

customer_reviews.title: Yummy smell and hydrating
customer_reviews.text: Smells yummy and is very hydrating. It’s like a thin gel so it’s not thick and heavy. I love it! Don’t forget to use it on your neck
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It feels great and it moisturizers my dry skin perfectly. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Really great product! You have to try.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a fan of this product. I have tried it myself many times. I find it really great. My daughter is a vegan and only looks for certain items. You skin feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet SURICO

customer_reviews.title: It works very well for me. I use it ...
customer_reviews.text: It works very well for me. I use it twice daily and I have very patchy dry skin. You also do not really need very much and there is no greasiness about it. I find one large jar lasts a little over 2 months
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Not moisturizing, but drying.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product as I found it to be very drying on the skin. Very disappointing as I do love other Tarte products, but the H2O hydrating boost was totally ineffective.
customer_reviews.author: Susan PIGNATELLI

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this moisturizer. I’ve purchased this in the past from Sephora, and it is honestly about the same price from there. But I get free shipping with Prime, so yeah... lol.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. Makes your skin feel great. I have semi-dry skin and it helped.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Like the product
customer_reviews.text: Keeps your face hydrate it. I like it. This is my second bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Nathaly Ajila Arevalo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Very moisturizing. Leaves my skin supple and hhydrated. Great for dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: nm

customer_reviews.title: Hydration
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders! Love this product and would recommend it to everyone! My skin is so hydrated!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing, light moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this face cream. Feels so fteshfreshing snd light on my skin. The line has such a strange name and funky packaging, but don’t let that scare you. It is exclusive to sephora, where you may be able to find it cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in a gift set from Sephora and I loved how soft it made my skin feel. It's not greasy and absorbs very quickly. Although, I've read that light weight gel moisturizer are better for oily skin so people with dry skin, you might want to look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: BL4CK5HEEP1015

customer_reviews.title: Combo/oily skin and it’s tacky when dry.
customer_reviews.text: I have combo/oily skin and I just can’t get behind this, no matter how much I wanted it to. It absorbs quickly, but leaves my face tacky, even with the smallest amount. I have other tarts products, so I’m pretty sad.
customer_reviews.author: Erin R

customer_reviews.title: One of the BEST
customer_reviews.text: I actually was gifted this product and I absolutely love it! Makes my skin feels smooth and rejuvenated. It’s hard to explain unless you experience it!!! Would totally purchase (little pricey for my budget) my quality over quantity!
customer_reviews.author: Gibones

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have combination dry/oily skin, and my face tends to breakout using other moisturizers and lotions. I got a sample of this and it's been fantastic, no breakouts and my skin looks hydrated and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Witt

customer_reviews.title: The Best Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite moisturizer I've used for my face. It leaves my face feeling super hydrated without feeling oily and doesn't pill when I use it right before applying makeup. I recently got sunburn on my face and this saved me from peeling all over.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Better than a good night’s sleep!
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is amazing! It plumped up my forehead, eyes and cheeks, my skin looks so refreshed! I noticed a difference the first day.
customer_reviews.author: EGV Mom

customer_reviews.title: Irritated my face
customer_reviews.text: Really burned my face. It made me feel more dry then before I put it on. I tried it for about a month, wasn’t sure if it was my face wash or this. It was this.
customer_reviews.author: kathryn young

customer_reviews.title: This got such rave reviews and felt great on the back of my hand
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin. I get oily in toons and extremely dry around my mouth and eye area. This got such rave reviews and felt great on the back of my hand, but after a week of trying to make it work, I'm giving up. It actually made me more flaky and dryer!! It made my skin feel tight. Not hydrating AT ALL very disappointed. Goin back to ponds
customer_reviews.author: veronica

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I've ever found for my face...maybe even for my life in general! I have the big jar and the small travel one. My face has never felt so amazing <3 yes its expensive in my opinion; I typically wont spend money like this on myself and my appearance, but this is so worth it! Plus its vegan! Score!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Clark

product_meta.title: tarte Rainforest of the Sea Drink Of H2O Hydrating Boost, 1.70 fl .oz
product_meta.description: Tarte Drink of H2O Hydrating Boost Moisturizer is a daily gel moisturizer that soothes and refreshes parched skin with hydration. It helps give a healthy glow from H2O. This cooling gel features a formulation of hyaluronic acid and sea salts to help hydrate skin. It's also formulated with marine antioxidants from tarte's Rainforest of the Sea complex.
feature_bullets: tarte Rainforest of the Sea Drink Of H2O Hydrating Boost
